roleset.name: search thoroughly
roleset.note: RANSACK-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from ransack.01-v)

example.name: transitive, arg0 and arg2
example.text: [*-2] Hastening to the attic , the temperature of which [*T*-1]was easilyhotter than the Gold Coast , you-2 proceeded [*-2] to mask the windows with afancy wool coverlet , some khaki pants , and the like , and to ransack theinnumerable boxes and barrels stored [*] there .
example.arg: the innumerable boxes and barrels stored [*] there
